A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a god action movie\, but a bad Star Wars movie. If you look at the Star Wars franchise\, no Star Wars movie has had as much comedy and just randomness. The porgs (though cute) felt out of all place\, the ‘fantastic’ city of gambling was so amazing as it was like Las Vegas. I enjoyed it as a normal movie but I didn’t like it as a Star Wars movie.
